lead_paragraph: SULTZER--Barnet Martin, 87, passed away on May 20, 2016 in New Paltz, NY. PHD of Microbiology and Immunology. Among his many scientific accomplishments they would include patents for chemical detoxification of endotoxins and the discovery of the genetic basis for mammalian responses to endotoxins including immunological and pathophysiological effects and the development of the first commercial immunological pregnancy test. Beloved husband to Judith M. Sultzer, proud father to Steven B. Sultzer and father-in-law to Robin E. Sultzer, loving grandfather to Rachel L. Sultzer and Samantha N. Sultzer and devoted brother to the late Rhoda L. Boughton. Science and Family, The Love of His Life. Graveside Service will be held at 1pm, Monday, May 23, 2016 at the Beth-El Cemetery, 735 Forest Ave., Paramus, NJ 07652. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SULTZER, BARNET MARTIN
